text: 4.41: Mt 8.29; Mk 1.25; 1.34; 3.11-12Ana vhɨra gumgi vhɨrve tɨn ŋiniŋgi mbatɨgi ga vharvharigim, nta mbe thamthav kɨrar hegi. Mba ŋiniŋgi mbatɨgi mbe thamthav kɨrar hav kaav khaŋ nzuai, “Ndu Fhe Bakɨmen Kam ma!” Mbe maaŋ nzuaim, ana mbe vhegap, buni suangen mbe thɨvi. Ana khaŋ muuŋgi ne nzuav mbe thɨvi, mbe ana kaŋgi, ana mba Fhe Bakɨme taagi wo gumgi gu mbigi ndir zav suaŋgiap fara sarav sarigi guma ma.
